subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Marc-Andre Fleury played his best game of the series until Carl Hagelin scored in overtime to lift the Rangers to another 2-1 win to clinch their series in five games.
snippet: Marc-Andre Fleury played his best game of the series until Carl Hagelin scored in overtime to lift the Rangers to another 2-1 win to clinch their series in five games.
